Articles.Content:
Alright folks I got 2 rockets for you.

One can def reach the moon and has a large lander on top with plenty of fuel and the other is a challenge I have for you, Ill let you be the judge of how much of a challenge but we here at JSA call it the gascan

this is the jersey test mk34, large fuel capacity and a large lander with yet again lots of fuel for those long nights out in space lol

and I got bored and messed around with this, I don\'t like it but I wanna see if someone can get it to fly, a challenge to you all.

The GASCAN
lol looks like the gascan is wtb a centre of gravity .... wont that just flip around?
it does but when I experimented with thrusters and different setups I actually got it to go straight up.
